name: Entry Level Waste Management Union Worker with Health Benefits
name_original: Entry Level Waste Management Union Worker with Health Benefits
description:
Life's been sort of a drag  since you got laid off. Luckily, you were contacted by a recruiter and hired (on the spot!) for an entry level waste management position!

It's your first day on the job so first impressions are important. The job comes with some caveats but hey, what job doesn't. Who needs OSHA? Your union negotiated for health benefits!

Gameplay:

A puzzle game where you control multiple characters while trying to dispose of radioactive waste!

8-Bits-To-Infinity Game Jam Team:

Pozitronic - Project lead, pixel artist, mechanics/level designer, steam punk convention goer.

Heerokazen - Mechanics/level designer, master debugger, robo-companion angel investor.

Criminal Doritoes - Pixel artist, game tester, cardboard hoarder.

Alephlol - UI design, writer, one-wheeler.
